document_data.caption: A map showing Maerduuth on the Akanamere.
document_data.name: Maerduuth
document_data.mainbody: '''Maerduuth''' was a small trading village located in the country of [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The village lay on the southeast coast of the [[Akanamere]] in western Chessenta just south of the [[Akanapeaks]].
document_data.History: Once a large city, Maerduuth was destroyed during a war with [[Akanax]] in the early 14{{th}} century DR.
